mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.*, c.* FROM Furniture a JOIN FurnitureCategory b ON a.f_category_id = b.f_category_id JOIN LLifeFurniture c ON a.f_id = c.f_id WHERE b.f_category_name IN ('소파', '테이블', '조명', '의자', '침대', '수납')

SELECT a.*, b.*, c.* FROM Furniture a JOIN FurnitureBrand b ON a.f_brand_id = b.f_brand_id JOIN LLifeFurniture c ON a.f_id = c.f_id WHERE b.f_brand_name IN ('Global Livart Gallery', '리바트', '리바트 H-몬도', 'FM 디자인', '리바트 온라인')
SELECT a.*, b.*, c.* FROM Furniture a JOIN FurnitureMood b ON a.f_mood_id = b.f_mood_id JOIN LLifeFurniture c ON a.f_id = c.f_id WHERE b.f_mood_name IN ('모던', '미니멀 /심플', '내추럴', '북유럽', '빈티지/레트로')
